snippet: James Rasulo, the company’s chief financial officer since 2010, was considered out of the running to succeed Robert Iger as the chief executive.
abstract: Disney's chief financial officer James A Rasulo will step down at end of June but will remain adviser to chief executive Robert A Iger; company does not announce successor.
lead_paragraph: James Rasulo, the company’s chief financial officer since 2010, was considered out of the running to succeed Robert Iger as the chief executive.

headline.main: Disney’s Top Financial Officer to Step Down
headline.print_headline: Top Executive for Finance Is Departing From Disney
